description:
Uranus and the other Outer Guardians warn the Star Lights to never see Sailor Moon again. Meanwhile, Usagi is worried about Seiya’s well-being after he gets injured taking a hit meant for Sailor Moon.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Truth Revealed: The Star Lights` Past
¡Se revela la verdad! El pasado de los Three Lights.
明かされた真実! セイヤ達の過去
